title: Morgan Stanley warns Oracle credit protection nearing record high
description: A gauge of risk on Oracle Corp.’s debt reached a three-year high in November, and things are only going to get worse in 2026 unless the database giant is able to assuage investor anxiety about a massive artificial intelligence spending spree, according to Morgan Stanley.

title: 'Zero-click' searches on rise due to AI summaries: Japan survey
description: More people are finding information from online searches without clicking links provided by search engines, indicating information summarized by generative artificial intelligence that now appears at the top of search results is being considered sufficient. title: Yale Student AI Cheating Suit Sees Discovery Halt as Judge Weighs Dismissal
description: A Connecticut federal judge has hit the brakes on discovery while she considers Yale University’s attempt to shut down a lawsuit filed by a student accused of using artificial intelligence to cheat on a final exam. In an order entered Tuesday, U.S. District Judge Sarah F. Russell said Yale and several university officials “have presented Judge pauses discovery as Yale Student AI Cheating Suit faces major bid for dismissal.

title: Mumbai Couple Arrested For Using AI To Create Fake Local Railway Pass
description: Police have detained a woman sales manager of a private bank and her engineer husband for allegedly creating a fake season pass for local railway travel in the Mumbai suburban network using Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools.

title: AI An 'Add-On': Anil Agarwal Calls Artificial Intelligence A Supplement To Human DNA
description: Vedanta Group Chairman Anil Agarwal views Artificial Intelligence not as a threat to human roles, but as a powerful supplemental tool, or an "add on," to Human Intelligence. In his recent post on X, the industrialist emphasised that the key to unlocking maximum efficiency and the "best outcome" is to treat AI as a collaborative partner, instructing users to actively combine AI's speed with their own critical "DNA."
content:
Vedanta Group Chairperson Anil Agarwal views artificial intelligence not as a threat to human roles, but as a powerful supplemental tool, or an "add on" to human intelligence.

title: Tijori raises $5 million from Zerodha, to expand into enterprise segment
description: "With the new investment, we are looking to expand into the enterprise segment with a suite of artificial intelligence products that help decide investment decisions of mutual funds, asset managers and insurance companies," Tijori founder and CEO Siddharth Hegde told Moneycontrol.
